title: How do you search for unicode strings?
content: In all versions of IDA, I can't seem to be able to search for unicode strings. When reversing programs, I constantly see unicode strings that could have really helped if I could see them in the strings window, but I can't. Anyone have a solution?

answers_data.content:
Enter the "strings window" by either press shift+F12 or go to View > Open Subviews > Strings in the toolbar.

Then, in the strings window, press Right Click and choose "Setup...". Check "Unicode" and press "OK".

comments.text: I can't believe I didn't know this until now, thanks in advance!
There is a registry change during this selection HKCU\Software\Hex-Rays\StrWinStringTypes -- REG_BINARY -- 00 01 02
Exactly what I was looking for. Thank you!
